topic.title: Viewing My Profile
topic.p: The View My Profile window stores user information about you including your name, login ID, password (encrypted), server disk space statistics, home directory, privileges, and the domain you are associated with.

p.p: In the My Profile menu group, click View My Profile (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.
The View My Profile window appears.
